programme.title: Double Take
programme.desc: A man trying to run away from trouble finds it follows him in unexpected ways in this action-packed vehicle for comic actors Eddie Griffin and Orlando Jones. Daryl Chase (Jones) is a successful investment banker who handles international accounts for a major New York firm. Chase discovers to his surprise that one of his biggest clients, a company from Mexico, is actually a front for a cartel of drug smugglers; Chase realizes too late that he's been framed for money laundering, and is now wanted by the FBI. Chase is soon approached by a CIA agent, who thinks Chase's relationship with the Mexican drug kingpins might prove useful, but when his local contact disappears, Chase has to make his way to Mexico in order to save his skin and hopefully clear his name. Needing a new identity to get out of town and across the border, Chase obtains a stolen passport -- and soon learns the man whose name he's using is in even deeper trouble with the law than himself. With nowhere else to turn, Chase asks streetwise hustler Freddie Tiffany (Griffin) to help him get out of town; Chase will pretend to be Freddie, while Tiffany will pose as a businessman like Chase. However, Chase finds out Tiffany isn't the man he thought he was, and that his sticky situation is even more perilous and fraught with secrets than he imagined. Double Take was inspired by the 1957 drama Across The Bridge, which was in turn based on a novel by Graham Greene; the supporting cast includes Edward Herrmann, Gary Grubbs, Garcelle Beauvais, and Daniel Roebuck

programme.title: Any Given Wednesday With Bill Simmons

programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: Stephen Herek's romantic comedy stars Angelina Jolie as Lanie Kerrigan, a New York-based television news reporter who anchors the morning show and is engaged to baseball star Cal Cooper, with whom she shares her flash lifestyle. Leaving aside her sparky working relationship with cameraman Pete, it all looks close to perfect to the outsider. But things take an abrupt about turn when she's sent to interview Prophet Jack, a sidewalk savant feted for his ability to predict football scores. He dutifully predicts the next day's results for her, as well as unseasonal weather, along with the unwelcome, unsettling news that she will die in a week's time. So far, so dismissible - until the scores come in, together with an unexpected hail storm, leaving Lanie with some serious thinking to do about what she wants from (her apparently foreshortened) life and her relationships..

programme.title: Meet the Spartans
programme.desc: From the creators of Scary Movie and Date Movie comes this tongue-in-cheek parody of the sword-and-sandal epics, dubbed Meet the Spartans. The 20th Century Fox production was written and directed by the filmmaking team of Jason Friedberg and Aaron Seltzer. Sure, Leonidas may have nothing more than a cape and some leather underwear to protect him from the razor-sharp swords of his Persian enemies, but that won't stop the brave leader and his team of 13 warriors from defending their beloved homeland against a powerful invading force that includes the likes of a mutant Paris Hilton, the Transformers, the Ghost Rider, and Rocky Balboa(n)

One man was smart enough to go to college, but has worked his entire life as a mechanic the other owns the hospital in which they are both patients. But these two men with little time left and even less to lose discover that life can be deeply moving and definitely hilarious(n)

programme.title: Godsend

programme.title: The Crash Reel
programme.desc: Kevin Pearce was an American snowboarder who became a star in the world of extreme sports, and an athlete who lived for the adrenaline rush of catching air on the half-pipe. Pearce seemed a sure bet to make the 2010 Winter Olympic team, but that all changed in 2009, when during training exercises in Park City, Utah, he miscalculated and suffered an accident that left him with a traumatic brain injury. Pearce had always been close to his family, and they rallied to his side as he went through grueling rehabilitation while recovering from his injuries. But when Pearce made it clear one of his first priorities was to get back on the half-pipe and someday return to competition, he discovered his loved ones were united against him, not wanting to see him suffer another accident that could be even more costly. Filmmaker Lucy Walker tells the story of Kevin Pearce and his long road to recovery, and also explores the dangers of a popular but very risky sport, in the documentary The Crash Reel. The film received its world premiere at the 2013 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Superb special effects propel this mind-bending sci-fi trip about a young man (Hayden Christensen) with the power to teleport himself anywhere on the planet. Life is a blast for him, until the arrival of a mysterious tracker (Samuel L. Jackson) from a secret society that is out to capture his kind and others like him. Directed by Doug Liman and written by David S. Goyer, Jim Uhls and Simon Kinberg, who adapted the script from Steven Gould's young-adult best sellers "Jumper" and "Exile."(n)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: An outlaw finds his life becoming all the more dangerous when he turns against a gang of criminals in this action drama. Frank Martin (Jason Statham) is a former Special Forces officer who lives on the French Mediterranean and has a lucrative second career as a underworld courier for hire. Martin will deliver anything anywhere, but he has three iron-clad rules - once the plan is in motion it cannot be changed, neither he nor his customers are to ever use their real names, and under no circumstances will he open the package. Martin is hired to make a delivery to a wealthy but unscrupulous American known as Wall Street (Matt Schulze), but after taking possession of the package he realizes that whatever is inside happens to be alive. Breaking his own rule, Martin opens the bag to discover a beautiful Asian woman, Lai (Shu Qi), who is bound and gagged. Lai briefly escapes, but Martin captures her, and delivers her to Wall Street as promised. However, after being given a parcel to deliver by Wall Street, Martin finds out what Wall Street is up to - in partnership with Lai's father Mr. Kwai (Ric Young), Wall Street is part of a scheme to smuggle Asian illegal aliens into France. Martin's conscience gets the better of him, and he sets out to rescue Lai and put Wall Street and Mr. Kwai out of business; however, as if this wasn't enough of a challenge, Martin discovers a French detective, Tarconi (Francois Berleand) has gotten wind of his illegal business. The Transporter was the first English-language feature for Hong Kong-based director Corey Yuen, who along with directing a number of HK action flicks designed fight choreography for several American films(n)

programme.desc: A misfit teenager forms an unlikely friendship with a female classmate who has leukemia. As they grow closer, she helps him with his creative endeavours and forces him to confront the messiness of real life(n)

programme.title: Forget Paris
programme.desc: Charming romantic comedy with Billy Crystal falling in love with Paris based airline executive Debra Winger and must decide between Paris and L.A(n)

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Gina Norris is a long way from the Barbershop - she's moved from Chicago to Atlanta so her daughter can attend a prestigious music school, and she's made a name for herself at a posh salon with her cutting-edge hairstyles. But when her egotistical boss takes credit for her work, she leaves the salon with the shampoo girl in tow to open a shop of her own. Gina buys a rundown salon and inherits a motley group of headstrong stylists, a colorful clientele, and a sexy piano-playing electrician. It's a rocky road to fulfilling her dreams, but you can't keep a good woman down(n)

programme.title: HBO Comedy Half-Hour
programme.desc: Margaret Cho. Margaret Cho makes observations on dieting, racism and her sitcom "All American Girl." Taped at the Variety Arts Theater in Los Angeles(n)

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: Juno may seem wise beyond her years, but after sleeping with classmate Bleeker, the pregnant teen quickly realises how little she really knows about life. Thankfully, Juno has been blessed with parents who trust their daughter's judgment, and a best friend named Leah, who's always willing to help out in a pinch(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: The Barden Bellas are back, determined to enter (and win) an international competition - one that has never had an American winner. After a disasterous performance elsewhere, the Bellas have much more to prove if they want to become the best!(n)

programme.title: Play It to the Bone
programme.desc: Boxing comedy drama about two ageing fighters who never made the big time but remain good friends. When an undercard bout in Las Vegas is cancelled at short notice, they are asked to step in. Unfortunately, they have to fight each other(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: WikiLeaks' Julian Assange and comedian Jeff Ross are the interview guests. The panelists are filmmaker Rob Reiner, former senator Rick Santorum and political commentator Tara Setmayer(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Journalism; and the Opening Ceremony of the 2016 Olympics in Rio are discussed(n)

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin inherited his Chicago barbershop from his dad, but now he's sold it to loanshark Lester. Hearing that the crook plans to turn it into a nightclub, Calvin resolves to get his salon back. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: Based on the popular cartoon character, this family-oriented "ghost story" is about a not-so-scary spirit who bonds with a little girl (Christina Ricci). The eternally irritable Ms. Carrigan (Cathy Moriarty) discovers that the only thing she's been left in her recently departed father's will is a rickety old house in New England. Naturally, the woman is furious about this, until her "close personal friend" and assistant, Dibbs (Eric Idle of Monty Python fame), discovers a secret message that a treasure may be concealed somewhere in the house. The two take off for Maine, only to learn that the house is haunted by Casper "the friendly ghost" and his three ghostly uncles Stinky, Stretch, and Fatso. After futilely recruiting an exorcist (Don Novello, more or less reviving his Father Guido Sarducci character from Saturday Night Live) and a "professional ghost exterminator" (Dan Aykroyd), she brings in a "ghost psychiatrist" (Bill Pullman) and his daughter Kat (Ricci). Innocently attracted to the young girl, Casper befriends Kat as they try to save the ghosts' home from the evil Carrigan. Eye-popping special effects highlight this magical story that touches (albeit lightly) on the theme of what lies at the heart of human desires. Clint Eastwood, Rodney Dangerfield, Mel Gibson and The Crypt Keeper (of Tales from the Crypt) all make cameos as apparitions in the mirror Bill Pullman looks into in the house(n)

programme.title: White Fang
programme.desc: In Randal Kleiser's entertaining adaptation of Jack London's classic novel White Fang, Ethan Hawke plays Jack Conroy, a young man who travels to Alaska with the intent of finding his father's lost gold mine. During the course of his travels, he's accompanied by a big white wolf that he rescued from a professional dog fight promoter. Conroy and the wolf, which he names White Fang, have a number of adventures and make a few enemies on their way to finding the gold mine(n)

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Cinderella. "Cinderella" (the voice of Daphne Zuniga) steps to a Latino beat in this musical version of the classic. Raquel Welch plays the stepmother, with Sonia Braga and Nely Galan as the jealous stepsisters. Also featuring Jimmy Smits and Edward James Olmos(n)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Fashion designer Anita and computer-game writer Roger meet, fall in love and marry along with their Dalmatians Perdita and Pongo. But the proud dogs' puppies are kidnapped by Anita's boss Cruella De Vil, who is stealing young Dalmatians to make the coat she has set her heart on(n)

programme.title: The Iron Giant
programme.desc: It is the year 1957 and Hogarth Hughes, a little boy who lives in the small town of Rockwell, discovers a man made out of iron, who comes from outer space and lost his memory, and saves him of dying by electrocution. Because of living in the middle of the Cold War, the boy thinks that the best option for this iron man is to stay in the junkyard of one of his friends and hide there until they get to a solution but an egocentric general of the military forces finds out what happened and begins to search for the giant in order to destroy him. Meanwhile, even though the boy thought he was going to find more help, the people of the town begin to feel terrified and want the problem to be solved no matter what(n)

programme.title: The Electric Company (?)
programme.desc: The Potato Custom.(n)

programme.title: One Last Hug (...and a few smooches) Three Days at Grief Camp (?)
Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: Hopelessly stranded on the remote shores of Madagascar, the New Yorkers hatch a plan to get back to Central Park that instead finds them soaking up sun in the picturesque plains of Africa. Madagascar may be a nice place to visit, but for the gang of animals who spent most of their lives in New York, there is truly no place like home. After discovering the remnants of a crashed airplane, the penguins quickly set about making the repairs needed to get the craft airborne again. When the plane finally takes to the sky, it begins to look like it's only a matter of time before Alex the Lion (voice of Ben Stiller) and friends are soaring over New York Harbor. Unfortunately the penguins weren't the aviation experts they claimed to be, and before long the crew is coming in for a crash-landing in the untamed plains of Africa. Now, as the animals reared in the safety of the zoo come into contact with their decidedly wild counterparts for the very first time, they get a better feel for their roots while marveling over the differences between life in the concrete jungle and life on the world's second largest continent. Of course, while there's plenty to love about wandering the open plains, romantic rivalries and the risk of running into dangerous poachers soon begin to outweigh the joys of some long-overdue family reunions. With some particularly heavy cases of homesickness causing hearts to weigh heavy, the group gradually starts to wonder whether they'll ever find their way back home. Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith, Sacha Baron Cohen, Cedric the Entertainer, and Andy Richter lend their voices to this animated sequel that re-teams original Madagascar co-directors Eric Darnell and Tom McGrath(n)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Fashion designer Anita and computer-game writer Roger meet, fall in love and marry along with their Dalmatians Perdita and Pongo. But the proud dogs' puppies are kidnapped by Anita's boss Cruella De Vil, who is stealing young Dalmatians to make the coat she has set her heart on(n)

programme.title: Max
programme.desc: A military dog named Max is adopted by his late handler's grieving family, and forms a close bond with the soldier's younger brother Justin. With the help of his canine friend, Justin explores the mystery of how his sibling died(n)

programme.desc: Fantasy drama about a successful but unfulfilled 40-year-old whose life is turned around when he magically meets a younger version of himself. Not only is he able to give the young lad advice about his own future, but it turns out that the youngster can also help his older self to be a better person(n)

programme.desc: A former astronaut-turned-farmer clashes with the authorities as he attempts to fire himself into space in a homemade rocket(n)

programme.desc: The cops have caught up with crook Ed Norton, but he still has 24 hours of freedom before going to jail. Powerful drama from Spike Lee. With Philip Seymour Hoffman(n)

programme.title: Off-Air
programme.desc: Off-Air(n)

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: A variety of horrible poisonous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions(n)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Frank Martin will transport everything - for a price. Ice cool under pressure and a brilliant driver, he makes only one mistake: opening a wriggling package to reveal a kidnapped Chinese girl(n)

programme.title: Dirty Driving: Thundercars of Indiana
programme.desc: Documentarian Jon Alpert visits Anderson, Ind., where residents who are still reeling from the closing of a once-thriving General Motors factory seek distraction from a struggling economy in auto racing at the local speedway on Friday nights(n)

programme.title: Mean Streets
programme.desc: Seminal film which conferred star-status on to actors Robert DE Niro, Harvey Keitel and director Martin Scorsese. Keitel is Charlie, a young man torn between his love of the Church, and his friend who is linked to the mob(n)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Aliens attack, but with air force ace Will Smith and President Bill Pullman, who'd bet against the US of A?(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: One man bears witness to the secret history of America during the Cold War in this drama directed by celebrated actor Robert De Niro. In 1939, Edward Wilson (Matt Damon) is a young man with a bright future ahead of him -- he's a top student at Yale and the protégé of one of the school's leading English professors, Dr. Fredericks (Michael Gambon). But Wilson's life changes dramatically when he's invited to join Yale's powerful secret society, Skull and Bones. Through his Skull and Bones connections, Wilson meets Sam Murach (Alec Baldwin), an mysterious FBI agent who asks Wilson to investigate charges that Fredericks is a Nazi sympathizer working with the German government. Later, at a Skull and Bones party, Wilson is introduced to Clover Russell (Angelina Jolie), the sister of one of his classmates and the daughter of a powerful politician; their one-night stand leaves Clover pregnant, and Wilson must leave the woman he loves, Laura (Tammy Blanchard), to wed Clover and give their child a name. Shortly after their wedding, thanks to his work with Murach, Wilson is invited to join the Office of Strategic Services, a military intelligence organization organized by Bill Sullivan (Robert De Niro), and Wilson accepts. Through World War II, Wilson serves with the OSS, and learns he can trust no one in the game of international espionage, which helps make him little more than a stranger to his wife, his son, and his few friends. As the OSS evolves into the Central Intelligence Agency after the war, Wilson becomes party to America's darkest and most dangerous secrets, and in the wake of the futile Bay of Pigs invasion in 1961, Wilson is forced to make a terrible choice between the security of his nation and the safety of his family. Inspired by the true-life story of CIA founder James J. Angleton, The Good Shepherd boasts an impressive supporting cast, including William Hurt, John Turturro, Billy Crudup, Joe Pesci, and Timothy Hutton(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Run for the Money. A homecoming football game may be just the thing for Gamby and Russell to bring about Dr. Brown's downfall(n)

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: Romantic comedy based on Nick Hornby's popular novel about a thirty something record shop owner struggling to reconcile his enthusiasm for music with his adult responsibilities. The shop is unprofitable, not least because of the two morose assistants with an aggressive customer-service manner. Add to this the misery of a string of failed relationships, and the scene is set for an obsessive review of the protagonist's past(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Aliens attack, but with air force ace Will Smith and President Bill Pullman, who'd bet against the US of A?(n)

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying

programme.title: Naked Lunch
programme.desc: David Cronenberg's bizarre and disturbing drama is based on William Burroughs' equally strange novel, with some outrageous sequences involving William Lee, an ex-drug addict who now makes a living from exterminating cockroaches. Suddenly, without warning, he is sucked into a seedy underworld inhabited by drug-taking spies, talking typewriter insects and sexually threatening Mugwumps, strange creatures from a place called Interzone

programme.title: Making of 'The Martian'
programme.desc: A look at "The Martian," a 2015 adaptation of Andy Weir's novel about a lone astronaut who is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry. The film stars Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain and Jeff Daniels, and is directed by Ridley Scott

programme.title: No Reservations
programme.desc: Though chef Kate Armstrong's Type A personality serves her well when whipping up meals in the trendy Manhattan eatery where she has made a name for herself, it threatens to sink her when she is named as the guardian of her nine-year-old niece Zoe. To complicate matters, an impetuous new sous chef named Nick Palmer has recently joined the kitchen staff and his freewheeling personality seems to stand in direct opposition to Kate's unwavering perfectionism. Irish Televsion Premiere (S)

programme.title: Fierce People
programme.desc: Actor-turned-director and producer Griffin Dunne (Practical Magic, Addicted to Love) teams up with scenarist Dirk Wittenborn for the slice-of-life ensemble drama Fierce People. As summer encroaches, 16-year-old Manhattanite Finn Earl (Anton Yelchin) would love nothing more than to trek off to South America and spend the year's sun-drenched months near the equator, embarking on thrilling adventures with his estranged archaeologist father, whom he's never met. Alas, the bonds of family rein in tight when Finn's booze- and coke-addled mother, the masseuse Liz (Diane Lane), cries out for help -- and, in the process, unwittingly gets Finn arrested. In a dramatic attempt to reverse circumstances and sort out the complications in both of their lives, Liz insists on taking custody of Finn for the summer. Both, she insists, will live in the home of one of her former massage clients, the aging billionaire Ogden C. Osborne (Donald Sutherland) -- with whom she may be amorously involved. Though Finn agrees begrudgingly at first, in time he finds the environment welcoming -- as he develops a crush on Ogden's gorgeous granddaughter (Kristen Stewart) and befriends Ogden's grandson. But when an unforeseen and shocking act of violence erupts, it estranges Finn and Liz from their posh surroundings and provides a sobering, harrowing reminder of the socioeconomic differences between the Earls and their new friends

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: A biography of Howard Hughes, centering on his glory years from the 1920s to the 1940s. After making a fortune improving the design of oil drilling bits, Hughes becomes the Hollywood mogul behind RKO studios, and devotes his lief to aviation. The film also depicts Hughes' romances Hollywood starlets Jean Harlow and Katharine Hepburn

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Produced by Tom Hanks, written by Aaron Sorkin, and directed by Mike Nichols, this adaptation of George Crile III's incendiary bestseller tells the remarkable story of the Texas congressman whose efforts to prevent the Red Army from overtaking Afghanistan eventually led to the collapse of the Soviet Union while simultaneously fueling the rise of radical Islam. In the early 1980s, a hastily assembled army of Afghan "freedom fighters" achieved the remarkable feat of fending off Soviet invaders despite the fact that the odds were overwhelmingly stacked against them. At the time, Texas congressman Charlie Wilson (Hanks) was a key member of the hugely powerful House Appropriations Committee. Illuminated to the specifics of this remarkable war by a high-profile Houston socialite, Wilson spearheaded an effort to provide hundreds of millions of dollars in weapons and training to the Mujahideen with more than a little help from brilliant but prickly CIA operative Gust Avrokotos

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Director Ridley Scott spins this yarn concerning a Harlem drug kingpin (Denzel Washington) who smuggles heroin into the country by hiding it in the bodies of U.S. soldiers killed during battle in Vietnam. As honest NYPD detective Ritchie Roberts (Russell Crowe) investigates the case, his integrity is compromised by the meddling of the crooked Detective Trupo (Josh Brolin)

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: In this high-octane thrill ride, a tight-knit gang of street racers must battle the brother of a defeated nemesis and rescue a software genius from terrorists. The film is dedicated to series regular Paul Walker, who died halfway through production

programme.title: Jackie Brown
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino's slick and fast-paced third film, based on an Elmore Leonard novel, a tight thriller centred around a strong woman, blaxploitation star Pam Grier, an air hostess towards the end of her career. She's been trafficking in 'hot' money for Samuel L Jackson but when she finds she's carrying enough for retirement, she decides to fly solo - so long as she can keep him, the local cops and the feds convinced of her honesty

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Produced by Tom Hanks, written by Aaron Sorkin, and directed by Mike Nichols, this adaptation of George Crile III's incendiary bestseller tells the remarkable story of the Texas congressman whose efforts to prevent the Red Army from overtaking Afghanistan eventually led to the collapse of the Soviet Union while simultaneously fueling the rise of radical Islam. In the early 1980s, a hastily assembled army of Afghan "freedom fighters" achieved the remarkable feat of fending off Soviet invaders despite the fact that the odds were overwhelmingly stacked against them. At the time, Texas congressman Charlie Wilson (Hanks) was a key member of the hugely powerful House Appropriations Committee. programme.desc: Retired male stripper Magic Mike decides to help his friends put on one last show, as the crew embark on a road trip to Myrtle Beach to perform at an exotic-dance convention. Along the way, they brighten the lives of several women in this sexy sequel(n)

programme.title: South Central
programme.desc: Steve Anderson's debut feature tells the story of LA gang man Bobby who comes out of prison only to find the new gang leader has turned it into a drugs-dealing operation and his woman Carole is turning tricks for her habit and neglecting the son born while he was inside. Pressured into committing a murder for the gang, he is caught and sent down again but this time, there is a chance of redemption and possible salvation when he once again regains his freedom(n)

programme.desc: Drama looking at how whistleblower Dr Jeffrey Wigand and a producer on the American current affairs show 60 Minutes took on the US tobacco industry in a bid to expose the addictive nature of nicotine. Así se embarca en la campaña mediática de Goni, el candidato neoliberal que busca alzarse con la presidencia de Bolivia. A través de tácticas de marketing, guerras sucias y otros artilugios ayudará al político a seducir a los votantes. Una película documental inspirada en hechos reales. (cc)

Down to Earth
programme.desc: Comic Chris Rock co-scripted and stars in this remake of 1941's Here Comes Mr. Jordan, which was also remade with Warren Beatty in 1978 as Heaven Can Wait. Comedian Lance Barton (Rock) is struggling to get his career off the ground when he dies in an untimely bus accident; arriving at the Pearly Gates, he discovers that he's not supposed to have passed on for another 50 years. Barton is not happy with this turn of events, and eventually the Powers That Be send his spirit back to Earth, but for the time being he has to make do with the body of a middle-aged, closed-minded millionaire, Charles Wellington. Lance falls in love with a young community activist (Regina King), but he soon finds he has bigger problems at home: the millionaire's wife and her lover are both trying to kill him. The supporting cast includes Mark Addy as an actor passing himself off as an English manservant, Chazz Palminteri as Mr. King, Heaven's no-nonsense manager, and Eugene Levy as Mr. Keyes, the angel who accidentally ends Barton's life(r)

programme.title: Rated A for Awesome
programme.desc: Double bill. When everyone except Thera gets a detention for an awesomisation that goes wrong, she becomes upset when the team turns the session into an ultra cool club. Then, awesome drum major Noam - the only one capable of making the school's awful marching band cool but who hates being in the limelight - is disguised by the team in a giant two-man bandleader costume.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: After discovering his family is moving because Norrisville is getting too dangerous, Randy decides he must defeat Cyborg Julian and make his town safe so that his parents will change their mind.

programme.title: Wander Over Yonder
programme.desc: Double bill. Lord Hater's desire to control and conquer gets the better of him. Then, Wander and Sylvia try to soften Lord Hater's giant flying battle beast.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. When a big-time Hollywood publicist discovers Spencer and vows to make him famous, Billy become insanely jealous. Then, when Billy discovers that sports stars have become even more famous than pop stars, he decides to inhabit Kleet's body and become a soccer star.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.sub-title: Billy, Billy, Billy, Billy, Billy/And the Winner Is.
programme.desc: Double bill. Billy creates a bunch of clones of himself, but one of the bands is a recipe for disaster. Then, Spencer has detention while the others go to an awards ceremony, and is determined to sneak out and join them.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Kat scratches Coop under a full moon, and Dennis is convinced his best friend will turn into a Were-Cat. Then, home alone on Halloween, Kat communicates with the Cat Nebula, setting up a rendezvous, while Coop and Dennis try to stop a feline invasion.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Dennis is accidently knocked into a portal that sends him on a trip around the world, so Coop makes Kat fix the broken device in order to get him back. Then, the feline makes himself invisible and causes trouble for Coop on the night Dad invites his teacher over for dinner.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Lucius O'Thunderpunch/Bring Me the Head of Ranginald Bagel!.
programme.desc: Double bill. McFist introduces himself as superhero, Lucius O'Thunderpunch. Then, Randy accidentally endangers a kid at school.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Weinerman Tested, Cunningham Approved/Sorcerer in Love 2: Sorceress' Revenge.
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys inadvertently help create a Ninja-seeking robot. Then, the Sorceress has returned to seek revenge on the Ninja.

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. Boyster and Rafik sign Shelby up for a TV game show, but the other competitors are not particularly honest. Then, Boyster thinks he's got no sense of humour and his desperation to be funny leads to chaos.

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: Brady grows jealous of a creature the boys meet called Ogie, and also befriends Lanny - little realising he wants to be king. Plus, Boomer nearly becomes dinner.

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: The boys learn a dangerous version of basketball called Junga Ball, and are automatically appointed captains because they are kings - but the power goes straight to Brady's head.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Perry is assigned to teach Doof to be a secret agent when the mad scientist decides to give up being evil.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. Phineas accidentally spills ice-cream on a bully, so heavyweight boxer Evander Holyfield turns up to train him for the fight. Plus, Candace gets a part in a film.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Get That Bigfoot Outa My Face/Tree to Get Ready.
programme.desc: Double bill. During a camping trip, Phineas tells stories about the mythical Bigfoot while the group huddle round the fire. Then, the boys remodel their treehouse.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Mabel's weird new boyfriend discloses some of the town's strange and uncanny secrets. Dipper finds a mysterious journal that hints at more of the town's hidden secrets.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Dipper goes into the forest on a quest to prove his manhood, encountering a giant talking bear. Guest starring the vocal talents of Alfred Molina and Jennifer Coolidge.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace swaps places with a princess who looks like her, but struggles to enjoy her new lifestyle because of her brothers' antics.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Doof comes to Candace's rescue when she has a party while her parents are away, and it gets out of hand, just as they arrive home unexpectedly.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: A musical edition of the cartoon, which sees Candace trying to get the boys in trouble after they build a rollercoaster in the garden.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Mabel realises she is slightly taller than Dipper, and when everyone begins to tease him about it, he heads into the forest to find height-altering crystals.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: The people of Gravity Falls celebrate Halloween in the summer, and Dipper enrages a monster who threatens to eat him if he does not collect enough sweets while trick or treating.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace teases the boys about the Lake Nose Monster, but becomes scared when she imagines seeing it while on lifeguard duty. When they finally meet the creature, they find it to be gentle and kind.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys build a `Perry translator' and use it to let the other animals air their grievances.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys offer their father a clue to complete a crossword.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys discover an unfinished time machine and decide to complete it, while Dr Doofenshmirtz hatches a plan to transform the secret agents into statues. Candace is chased by dinosaurs in a prehistoric era, and when their time machine is smashed, the girls come to the rescue.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace takes the DVD from a traffic camera and shows it to her mother as proof of the boys' misdeeds.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The stepbrothers decide to create the world's biggest bowling ball.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys find a chameleon and call it Steve. Meanwhile, Jeremy accidentally operates the Gigantinator, making the reptile dinosaur-sized and scaring all the locals.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys build mechanical bulls and want to have a robot rodeo.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys vow to make their mother's birthday her best ever, in competition with Candace, whose plans go disastrously wrong.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Journey to the Centre of Candace.
programme.desc: Isabella's dog eats her sash, and the boys decide to shrink themselves so they can get inside the animal and retrieve it - but Candace accidentally swallows them.

programme.title: How Ridiculous
programme.desc: Video clips showing bizarre events or behaviour.

programme.title: Lab Rats
programme.desc: Davenport is in a critical condition after a battle and in a bid to ave him, Leo risks his life to perform a dangerous bionic process.

programme.title: Lab Rats
programme.desc: The Lab Rats learn they will be mentors at the new Davenport Academy. Leo is upset to find out he is a student, not a mentor and in his frustration causes a flood.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.sub-title: Dipper and Mabel v the Future.
programme.desc: Mabel decides to plan for her and Dipper's 13th birthday party. Meanwhile, Dipper ventures below the town to find its most shocking secret.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Part one of four. Trapped in the apocalypse and menaced by villains new and old, Dipper finds himself in a race against time.

programme.title: Supa Strikas
programme.desc: The Supa Strikas star in a B-movie that goes to the top of the charts. They get big-headed, so it is up to the coach to bring them back down to earth. However, a desert detour goes horribly wrong.

programme.desc: The boys vow to make their mother's birthday her best ever, in competition with Candace, whose plans go disastrously wrong.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys organise a games tournament to settle an argument between Isabella and Buford about who is the better player.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The stepbrothers build a giant observatory to get a better view of Kermillian's comet, something that everyone is waiting to see.

programme.title: Atomic Puppet
programme.desc: AP takes it personally when Atomic Puppet does not get the media recognition he feels they deserve, but Joey suspects there are other forces at work.

programme.title: Counterfeit Cat
programme.desc: Gark and Max must pass a series of tests to prove their worth as cats. Animated adventure for younger viewers.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Spoof of Star Wars in which the fate of the galaxy lies in the hands of the inventive brothers.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace adopts a stray rabbit, but the boys discover it is a spy.

programme.desc: Marco has his worst day ever and Star cheers him up. Later when Star has a bad day, Marco tries to return the favour, but ends up summoning Ludo and his army of giant monsters.

programme.title: Pickle and Peanut
programme.desc: There is a volcano in town - and it is threatening to erupt. Animated adventures.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: With the team divided, Tony seeks help from Ant-Man. He's busy fighting Modok, so Stark's team joins Ant-Man to stop the Pym Particle thief.

programme.desc: Part one of two. Spider-Man's dream of becoming one of the Avengers turns into a nightmare when Loki switches bodies with the web-slinger, turning his new team-mates against him.

programme.title: Gamers Guide to Pretty Much Everything
programme.desc: After Wendell saves him from a life-threatening accident, Conor feels indebted to his friend and allows Wendell to move in with him.

programme.title: Gamers Guide to Pretty Much Everything

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace looks for an antique she can trade for a valuable piece of memorabilia. With the voice of Jonathan Ross.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace liquifies herself after coming into contact with the duo's device that turns solids into liquids. Meanwhile, Doof transforms himself into a platypus to fight Perry.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys discover a strange planet is hurtling towards Danville. Phineas and Ferb set out to avert a disaster while Buford looks forward to making contact with aliens.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb

programme.title: CBBC @ The Ten Pieces Prom
programme.desc: Transferring the magical world of the BBC Ten Pieces cinema film into an exciting and immersive Prom at the Royal Albert Hall, the BBC National Orchestra of Wales and conductor Thomas Sondergard are joined by firebirds and fast cars, magic mountains and mountain trolls, stormy seas and wicked witches, as they take the family audience on a journey through ten pieces of classical music. Presenters including Blue Peter's Barney Harwood, Dick and Dom, and Friday Download's Molly Rainford introduce Mozart's Horn Concerto, Mussorgsky's Night on a Bare Mountain and John Adams' Short Ride in a Fast Machine, the dancers of Trinity Laban perform Anna Meredith's striking body percussion piece Connect It and a massed children's choir of 450 sing Handel's Zadok The Priest. The creativity of the nation's children takes centre stage, as their extraordinary artwork and performances in response to the pieces are showcased on big screens and the lucky few perform live on stage with their own dances and compositions. With a lively soundtrack, all-round action, audience participation, a few surprises and a lot of fun along the way, this is the fitting culmination to the first year of the BBC's biggest ever music education initiative, one which has already engaged half of all the primary schools in the country.(n)
